TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit ContentMergeIterator extends System.ValueType

Docs.summary: Iterates over child content nodes or following sibling nodes. Maintains the nodes in document order.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Create(class System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlNavigatorFilter filter) cil managed

Docs.param: An instance of the class, which enables you to filter nodes based on name.
Docs.summary: Initializes the . Merges multiple sets of content nodes in document order and removes duplicates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The Current property changes when the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ContentMergeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method sets the Current property to the next node and returns <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.IteratorResult>; otherwise, the Current property remains unchanged.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.IteratorResult MoveNext(class System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator input) cil managed

Docs.summary: Positions the iterator on the next content or sibling node.
Docs.returns: Returns if there are no more content or sibling nodes. Returns if the next input node must be fetched first. Returns if the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ContentMergeIterator.Current%2A> property was set to the next node while iterating through the nodes.
